channel.title: favicon on 老高的技术博客
channel.description: Recent content in favicon on 老高的技术博客

item.title: favicon优化
item.description: 现代浏览器会自动识别favicon，只要放到网站根目录就OK，但是完美一点的话就参考以下代码： <link href="/favicon.ico" mce_href="/favicon.ico" rel="shortcut icon" type="image/x-icon" /> <link href="/favicon.ico" mce_href="/favicon.ico" rel="bookmark" type="image/x-icon" /> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" href="https://blog.phpgao.com/usr/themes/default/img/apple-touch-icon-57x57.png" /> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="72x72" href="https://blog.phpgao.com/usr/themes/default/img/apple-touch-icon-72x72.png" /> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="114x114" href="https://blog.phpgao.com/usr/themes/default/img/apple-touch-icon-114x114.png" /><link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="120x120" href="https://blog.phpgao.com/usr/themes/default/img/apple-touch-icon-120x120.png" /> <link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="152x152" href="https://blog.phpgao.com/usr/themes/default/img/apple-touch-icon-152x152.png" /> 很简单吧，根据rel属性就能判断出来，shortcut icon为默认的图标，bookmark就是加入收藏栏的图标，最后一个就是在IOS系统上使用的图标啦
